title: Policy Domain Schema
description: Schema for formal statements or principles that guide decision-making and operational behavior

policy.description: A guiding principle that sets boundaries and constraints for organizational behavior

title.description: The name or title of the Policy

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Policy entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Policy within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Policy

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Policy is linked

requirements.description: Specific conditions or criteria to be met under the Policy

complianceMetrics.description: Measures to ensure adherence to policies

reviewFrequency.description: How often the Policy is reviewed and updated

approvals.description: Individuals or groups that must approve the Policy

relatedPolicies.description: Policies that are related or linked to this Policy

complianceAndStandards.description: Regulatory requirements and standards the Policy must adhere to

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the Policy and its implementation

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the Policy can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Policy aligns with the Organization's strategic goals and objectives
